text: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Yemwe abahawe igitabo! Nimuze ku ijambo riboneye hagati yacu namwe; ryuko tutagomba kugira uwo dusenga utari Allah, kandi ntitugire icyo tumubangikanya na cyo, ndetse bamwe muri twe ntibazagire abandi ibigirwamana basenga mu cyimbo cya Allah. Ariko nibabitera umugongo, muvuge muti "Nimuhamye ko twe turiabicisha bugufi (Abayisilamu)
